title: Sora
author: Chris Messina
excerpt: Sora is OpenAI’s video generation model, designed to take text, image, and video inputs and generate a new video as an output. Users can create videos in various formats, generate new content from text, or enhance, remix, and blend their own assets.
text: Payment RequiredSora is OpenAI’s video generation model, designed to take text, image, and video inputs and generate a new video as an output. Users can create videos in various formats, generate new content from text, or enhance, remix, and blend their own assets.Launched inDesign Tools Digital Art Video byGPT-4 by OpenAI
html:
Payment Required

Sora is OpenAI’s video generation model, designed to take text, image, and video inputs and generate a new video as an output. Users can create videos in various formats, generate new content from text, or enhance, remix, and blend their own assets.
